metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5957 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in the DumpSysVar function in var.c in Remind before 3.1.15 allows attackers to have unspecified impact via a long name.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5957` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

remind - 03.01.15-1
tkremind - 03.01.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: remind package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '03.01.15-1').
